Up | 5–7 years | Strengthen the causal map by codifying explicit regime-transition thresholds around cloud CAPEX and labor productivity, calibrated to MSFT/Shopify earnings power using the 21.2% cloud CAGR and Just Capital signals | What to watch: regime-transition thresholds tied to cloud CAPEX and labor governance with data anchors (0G3A676BP)(4LQD15CFU) | 70%
Up | 0–3 months | Embed a quantified near-term trigger schedule for Pacaso expansion, HeartSciences FDA progress, UAS jobs growth, and Japanese wage momentum | What to watch: cadence of Pacaso rollout, FDA/regulatory milestones, UAS data cadence, and wage prints with IDs (ILYC1M41F)(FOM34PUWA)(A7VLN74BK) | 60%
Down | 5–7 years | Define explicit labor-cost shock scenarios and margin compression risks for moat-driven platforms, tying to wage/benefit signals and cloud productivity (4LQD15CFU)(0G3A676BP) | What to watch: wage-growth thresholds and governance indicators that would compress margins and invalidate the base-case | 40%
Down | 0–6 months | Bear-case: Pacaso international rollout stalls, HeartSciences delays, Range underperformance, UAS growth slows, and Japanese inflation risk rises; watch regulatory cadence and wage data (ILYC1M41F)(FOM34PUWA)(A7VLN74BK) | What to watch: regulatory cadence, cross-border rollout, and wage prints | 35%
